author: thomasm
msg: OAK-622 Improve QueryIndex interface (sort using index if possible) (WIP)

author: elecharny
msg: o Used the interface instead of direct references to classes for controls/extOps
o The ControlFactory interface now only take one generic parameter
o We don't return anymore a decorator when creating a new codec control, but a CodecControl instance
o Moved the controls into sub-packages
o Renamed the SortRequestControl and SortResponseControl to SortRequest and SortResponse
